name: Amnesia Warrior
description:
AMNESIA WARRIOR

This is a short action Platformer built as a submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2 within 1 week. Probably the biggest game that I've managed to "complete" for a game jam to date! I haven't had time to finish the level art within the allowed time but I might release a second version with complete art and a couple of tweaks.

Overall I'm pretty happy and would love for you to play it!

--- CONTROLS

Left Click - select / attack

Space - Jump

A or Left Arrow - move left

D or Right Arrow - move right

That's about it! I hope you enjoy!
